content:
Hi Fellow Discord User 
This is an example message! Use 
to change lines.
You can use <user> for mentioning the user

embeds.title: This can be a link
embeds.description:
You can have embeds however you like them. As long as you send them in the correct format, they will be sent!
You can mention the user inside the embed too: <user>

fields.name: <-- You can add any colour but be sure it's in decimal
fields.value: This is an embed field, you can add this too. You can delete anything from here to not have it show up.

fields.name: <username>
fields.value:
You can add images too and set their size
[click here](https://github.com/hoemotion/Discord-Mass-DM/)

author.name: Use this website to make your Embed easily.
